SSOCIATION OF EDUCATIONAL BROADCASTERS
OFFICE OF THE REGIONAL DIRECTOR
Alabama Educational TV Commission
807 Protective Life Building
Birmingham, Alabama
March 14, 1961
Mrs. Dorothy Templeton
N.A.E.B.
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W.
Washington 6, D.C.
Dear Mrs. Templeton:
We would appreciate your forwarding us a supply of NAEB envelopes.
Thank you for your assistance.
Sincerely yours,
Raymond D. Hurlbert
Director, Region II
RDH/ml
